Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory756.jpg'}
{3: 'At long last, the townspeople drove all of the Hetero-Creatures away, and the Forsaken that had tried to breach the town have all been eliminated.'}
{3: 'Most of the buildings in town survived the attack, with only a few having been damaged.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "I just need the tavern to still be around by the end of it... it's all I need to live on!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "****! Do you even know what's coming out of your mouth?! My wheat... they're all gone with the fire!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The wheat fields outside out of town are now a sea of fire, having been set aflame by the Hetero-Creatures.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Max', 3: "Lucky that we were done gathering most of the wheat... and as for what's gone...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Says Max as he walks up to the burned field and picks up a handful of ashes that's still warm."}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'These ashes will turn into richer soil and bring us an even greater harvest next year...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "And that's just like this townâ€”you lose some but you gain some, and everything will eventually spring back to life.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Max tidies up his blood-stained jacket and walks up to Vera and the Purifying Force.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'We really owe all of you a big one...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Likewise. There is no way we would have been able to stop them without all your help.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Right... Agree.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With a knowing smile, Vera looks at Max.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But if you really want to thank us, we'll gladly take this bartender back to Babylonia with us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'What a choice. This is the best bartender we have in town.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'And the only one, too. Hahaha!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Max', 3: 'But... guess this bartender of ours does deserve to go further than beyond this town.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'We have a deal, then. Question is... where is this bartender in question here?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera looks around, remembering still seeing the "bartender" giving out commands toward the end of the fight.'}
{3: "Right then, out of a corner comes No. 21's shout."}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "Captain! I... I can barely hear the commandant's heartbeat now!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: 'Vera makes her way through the crowd in a panic. She has no choice but to go ahead with an examination in the tavern, for want of a proper medical environment.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Old Lady', 3: "You've got to save this good soul, Missy...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Yes, you gotta save this good soul! I mean, it's not like I know how it's done or anything...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: '****!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Jesus, get these people out for me already, Issarius!', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: "Issarius doesn't like the idea of taking an order from Vera but does the bidding anyway after a moment's hesitation and kicks all the lookie-loos out of the tavern with the other Purifying Force members."}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "Captain... what's going to happen to Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'That Nigel is one hell of a man... This is worse than I thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant... can you still hear me?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You manage to keep yourself awake but can't say a word."}
{3: "The world as you see it starts growing blurry, to the point you can barely make out Vera's words anymore."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "He's connected with Noctis... and when Noctis feels despair, it rubs off on the Gray Raven Commandant here, which speeds up the spread of the poison.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Just what's up with that idiot?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What did you say...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Trying to pick up your words, No. 21 straightens her Inver-Device.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Commandant... wants to perform a Deep M.I.N.D. connection with Noctis.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Are you trying to kill yourself...?! Your consciousness will be bound to his if you do that... and you're dead meat if he weakens.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph... so you're choosing to trust him here, huh? The guy might not be the smartest of apples, but he's got a will as strong as iron. That much I'll give him.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sighing with a wry smile, Vera has made up her mind.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Well, let's give it a try, then... and see what sort of miracle you two can bring about.", 4: '1'}
